subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Defenseman Kevin Klein, sidelined with a broken arm since March 11, will be available to play in the team’s next series, but right wing Mats Zuccarello is out indefinitely with an upper-body injury.
snippet: Defenseman Kevin Klein, sidelined with a broken arm since March 11, will be available to play in the team’s next series, but right wing Mats Zuccarello is out indefinitely with an upper-body injury.
